Topic.Title: KO's largest customer has Black CEO

Message.Msg: If they are minorities and represent a small portion of society, then why should they be represented more in the Exec level?

Topic.Title: So what is record date of holding to get split?

Message.Msg: Since the record date is July 27, and the split is like a dividend, wont the stock trade ex-split on the 25th, or on a when issued basis on that date? If your trade is settling after the record date, you should be buying the already split shares. The market maker will take care of this for you.

Message.Title: I THOUGHT THIS WOULD GO
Message.Msg: TO 90.00 OR 100.00 BEFORE SPLIT ANY THOUGHTS?????????????????
